channel.title: Ebisu-Gx - Bosses - Minigames - PVP - ECO - Skilling - We need YOU!
channel.description:
[CENTER][COLOR="#00FFFF"][I]Welcome To Ebisu-Gx[/I][/COLOR][/CENTER]
We are a 718 RsPs Currently VPS Hosted, With a 24/7 Uptime. Here is the list of features, under that will be pictures :) Enjoy!
[CENTER][COLOR="#FFFF00"]24/7 Uptime Working Dungeoneering, with dungeoneering points and shop! Farming Working completely!! Grand Exchange, No bugs, Fully working ~~ Completly automatic Voting and donating systems! Trivia system working, with over 200 questions and anagrams! Trivia Shop! Over 30 Bosses, including Avatar, Vorago, Bork, Barrelchest, and more! Drygores! Co-Op Bossing Co-Op Slayer!!! Squeal Of Fortune working 100% Custom Titles Amazing Xp Rates 200m Xp capes Crystal Key Chest with over 150 different items~~ Kiln Cape (Tokhaar-Kal) in different colors! New Graphics for Some items Pets (Jad, Baby glacor, Baby sunfreet, and over 10 more) Completionist, max, 5 year cape, 10 year cape, and more~~ Skiller completionist cape (custom) Custom Items (Beats, and more ) Pking System with pk points and shop! Skill Points system with shop! Fully working minigames! Armoured Zombies for Donators mingame~ Custom Dark Invasion Minigame! DropChance! Godwars 100% Working, with KillCounts! Loyalty Points Shop, including Fully working Auras and items~ Missions for bosses (Contracts) Kill for money! Unique Donator zone! Amazing Home! Skilling Island! Player Achievements~~ Renders For Regular Players~~ ( Drummer, Drunk, Fly, Swim, and more)! Daily updates! Double Xp Weekends! Xp Well (Hit the goal cash for 4x Xp)! Active and Helpful Staff Team~~ [/COLOR][/CENTER]
Promo Vid [video]https://youtu.be/tKhWOWbmrbo[/video]
Loyalty Shops [IMG]http://oi59.tinypic.com/ne7wcg.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://oi61.tinypic.com/8x62o3.jpg[/img]
Vote Shops [IMG]http://oi59.tinypic.com/33uvb6b.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://oi60.tinypic.com/15o8hvs.jpg[/img]
Grand Exchange [IMG]http://oi60.tinypic.com/28mehyt.jpg[/img]
Spirit Tree [IMG]http://oi61.tinypic.com/2w3z1vp.jpg[/img]
Trivia Shops [IMG]http://oi61.tinypic.com/o6hfzt.jpg[/img]
Bank With Tabs [IMG]http://oi57.tinypic.com/eg7lnb.jpg[/img]
DropChance command! (Shows drops from a specific npc and a specific amount of kills) usage: ;;dropchance (npcid) (amountofkills) here is loot from 100 nex kills [IMG]http://oi59.tinypic.com/2mfy8aq.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://oi57.tinypic.com/faxa39.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://oi59.tinypic.com/r6xwtw.jpg[/img]
Co-Op Slayer interface [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/smaii8.jpg[/img]
Donator Pets [IMG]http://oi62.tinypic.com/15ywx75.jpg[/img]
Sunfreet [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2wem6mc.jpg[/img]
Personal Player Profile [IMG]http://oi59.tinypic.com/n38706.jpg[/img]
Renders [IMG]http://oi61.tinypic.com/14nk03b.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://oi59.tinypic.com/24uvmf9.jpg[/img]
Quest Tab [IMG]http://oi57.tinypic.com/2j9mps.jpg[/img]
Slayer Teleports [IMG]http://oi61.tinypic.com/303fu6d.jpg[/img]
GodWars With KC [IMG]http://oi60.tinypic.com/118dgtj.jpg[/img]
Dark Invasion Minigame [IMG]http://oi57.tinypic.com/30lflsj.jpg[/img]
Some donator bosses [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/30wo6dc_th.jpg[/img]
Clue Scrolls [IMG]http://oi61.tinypic.com/5ldqqb.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://oi61.tinypic.com/x1mttv.jpg[/img]
Working Overloads, Working barrows 100% [IMG]http://oi57.tinypic.com/jhsjrs.jpg[/img]
Shops [IMG]http://oi62.tinypic.com/288t7is.jpg[/img]
MasterSkillCapes (200m xp capes) [IMG]http://oi62.tinypic.com/25u7b0o.jpg[/img]
Contractor (kill your assigned boss for cash) [IMG]http://oi61.tinypic.com/290wuv6.jpg[/img]
SOF [IMG]http://oi61.tinypic.com/2j1nbk9.jpg[/img]
Party Demon [IMG]http://oi61.tinypic.com/bim2hs.jpg[/img]
Barrows Chest [IMG]http://oi61.tinypic.com/2mop4as.jpg[/img]
Farming ~~ Wooo [IMG]http://puu.sh/gRIFN/97fdefac78.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/gRIBM/8a7f8df20f.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/gRIrT/70374c0549.jpg[/img]
Dungeoneering! [IMG]http://oi61.tinypic.com/2e2kvae.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://oi62.tinypic.com/9uor60.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://oi57.tinypic.com/2u92x5t.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://oi62.tinypic.com/n33p5k.jpg[/img]
Current achievements, more to come!! [IMG]http://oi61.tinypic.com/1zh0ew1.jpg[/img]
Join and Stay!! [IMG]http://oi59.tinypic.com/11tvk7t.jpg[/img]
We have much more plans for the server, and we are working on many updates right now, such as Iron Man, 100% working construction (working 90% atm, we want it 100%), and much more!!
[URL=http://"http://www.ebisugx-rsps.com"]Website[/URL] [URL=http://"http://ebisugx-rsps.com/forums/index.php?/forum/7-download-client/"]Client[/URL]
Thank you for reading, we hope you join soon and like our server :)
Please dont hate ;)
